meanings.definition: To lift or move to a higher position
meanings.sent1: Please raise your hand if you have a question.
meanings.sent2: He used a crane to raise the heavy box to the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to raise the rabbit out of the hat, but it was too big.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to raise the spirits of everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays slowly raise over the horizon, signaling the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: To increase in amount or level
meanings.sent1: The company decided to raise the prices of their products.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard can raise your grades in school.
meanings.sent3: The chef added extra spices to raise the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her promotion will raise her status within the organization.
meanings.sent5: The cheers from the crowd raise in volume as the team scores a goal.

meanings.sent1: She worked hard to raise her children with good values.
meanings.sent2: It takes a village to raise a child, they say.
meanings.sent3: The grandparents help raise the grandchildren with love and care.
meanings.sent4: The community center offers workshops on how to raise kids effectively.
meanings.sent5: Raising a child requires patience, understanding, and lots of love.

meanings.sent1: The workers will raise a new building in the empty lot.
meanings.sent2: They plan to raise a bridge over the river for easier access.
meanings.sent3: The team of architects will raise a modern skyscraper in the city center.
meanings.sent4: The volunteers helped raise a playground for the local children.
meanings.sent5: The construction crew will raise the walls of the house before sunset.

meanings.definition: To cause to rise or stand up
meanings.sent1: The coach's speech always raises the team's motivation before a game.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise made the cat raise its ears in alert.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected news made her raise from her seat in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The music was so catchy that it made everyone raise to dance.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread baking in the oven raised everyone's appetite.
